DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate preservation promotion health student college year .
DOC.brief_title: NUYou : mHealth Intervention Preserve Promote Ideal Cardiovascular Health
DOC.detailed_description: Freshman college student Northwestern University cluster randomize two group base dorm . The intervention one group target smoking , physical activity , BMI consumption fruit vegetable . The intervention second group target drive behavior , sexual risk behavior , sunscreen use hydration . Baseline health lifestyle measure assess participant prior intervention . Health assessment measure height , weight , fast glucose , total cholesterol carbon monoxide . The lifestyle measure ask question physical activity , diet , alcohol tobacco use , safe sex practice , drive habit , sunscreen use . These measure repeat fall student ' sophomore junior year .
DOC.criteria: Freshman Northwestern University fall 2015 Live campus Read , write speak English Own Iphone Android smart phone Pregnant try become pregnant Established cardiovascular disease Unstable psychiatric medical condition
